record.dc:title: 83Lu92 Koger's Island, Lauderdale County, Alabama. Pottery vessels found in association with burials.
record.dc:creator: William S. Webb
record.wpa:narrative: Pottery vessels from burial association. On the left is F.S. #165, which was found in association with Burial #s 41, 42, & 43 (multiple burial). F.S. #17 is on the right and was found in association with Burial #6.
